resources.string: We\'re sorry. We are unable to determine a valid limit.
Please contact us for assistance in accessing the Mobile Check Deposit feature.

You will be receiving a confirmation email shortly. Please retain your check in a safe place for at least 60 days. Checks deposited before 6:30 PM EST will be posted to your account on the next business day.
Enjoy the ease and convenience of Mobile Check Deposit.\n\nTo start, simply open up a Money Market or Discover Savings account.
We\'re sorry, there has been a problem depositing your check. The transaction was not completed. Please contact customer service for more information.
Oops! This check has already been deposited into your selected bank account.

Auto Capture Tips:
• Frame the check within the white box
• Tap the middle of the screen to focus the image
• Tap the Capture button and stay steady as it counts down 3, 2, 1
• Tap Retake if the image isn\'t clear
• Tap Confirm if you are satisfied with the image
• Repeat these steps for the back of the check

Review the Capture:
• Ensure the front and back are in focus
• Ensure the back is endorsed
Choose where you\'ll deposit your check.
You must deposit the whole value of the check.
Use the camera on your phone to capture the front and back of the check.
All information you entered for this deposit will be lost. You\'ll need to re-enter the information to complete the transaction.
Are You Sure You Want to Go Back?
Your deposit is being sent securely to the bank. Please wait for the transaction to be completed.
